comments.text: The fenix browsertime tests are not running in the cron anymore because of the fenix-nightly changes which were applied over the live-site changes in the wrong manner.
comments.raw_text: The fenix browsertime tests are not running in the cron anymore because of the fenix-nightly changes which were applied over the live-site changes in the wrong manner.
comments.author: gmierz2@outlook.com
comments.creator: gmierz2@outlook.com

comments.raw_text: This patch re-enables the Fenix browsertime tasks in mozilla-central that run through a cron job.

Bug 1636504 - Re-enable Fenix browsertime cron tasks.


This patch re-enables the Fenix browsertime tasks in mozilla-central that run through a cron job.
